tool_description: Identify toxicity, indecent, threat, offensive, erotic, and spam comments using one API.
name: Text Moderator
title: Text Moderator

api_list.name: Text Moderation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-moderator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/moderate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-moderator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
